name: A Slime's Story
description:
Hi there!

This is just my first attempt at making a game. I had loads of fun making   A Slime's Story, and if you find it enjoyable in the slightest, then that's good enough for me.

Special Thanks to:
Eric Matyas (https://soundimage.org/)
Juhani Junkala (https://opengameart.org/users/subspaceaudio)

For publishing free music and sound effects for creative use.
